titles.title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide wildfire smoke mitigation assistance to States and units of local government, and for other purposes.
Smoke-Ready Communities Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
